summary: This mod will add all kind of Guards to game that you can use them to protect your Home,Castle,even yourself!
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41087/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D41087&pUp=1]
[/url][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#999999]Updated on 9/12/14[/color][/font]


[color=#ff0000][size=5][color=#6d9eeb][size=6]Become who have Guards

[/size][/color]
Creatures Edition:[/size][/color]

This Time All kind of Creatures as Guard :)
this creatures are available:
1.Dog Guard
2.Spider Guard
3.Giant Spider Guard
4.Falmer Guard
5.Draugr Guard
6.Bear Guard
7.Wolf Guard
8.Skeleton Guard
9.Troll Guard
10.Giant Guard
11.Sabrecat Guard


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Male Version:[/size][/color]

in this Version these Guards can be spawned:
1.Steel Guard
2.Scaled Guard
3.Leather Guard
4.Blades Guard
5.Companions Guard
6.Daedric Guard
7.Glass Guard
8.Dragonscale Guard
9.Dragonplate Guard
10.Dwarven Guard
11.Elven Guard
12.Hide Guard
13.Steelplate Guard
14.Orcish Guard
Each one of them have all armor and weapon sets from their names :)
(for example: Steel Guard got Steel Armor set and Steel Sword and bow)
The Guards with Stronger Armor have more Health and Stamina,and got higher lvl limit :P
Their lvl will calculated by Players lvl :)





[color=#ff0000][size=5]Female Edition:[/size][/color]

In this version all Guards in Male Version are available as Female!
Female Guards Name is same as Male with a little difference:
Female Guards name are "Guardress" not "Guard" :)
For Example: "Glass Guardress"




[color=#ff0000][size=5]Imperial Edition:[/size][/color]

This Got These:
1.Light Imperial Guard
2.Light Imperial Guardress
3.Heavy Imperial Guard
4.Heavy Imperial Guardress
5.Studded Imperial Guard
6.Studded Imperial Guardress
7.Commander Imperial Guard
8.Commander Imperial Guardress



[color=#ff0000][size=5]Stormcloak Edition:[/size][/color]

This Got These:
1.Light Stormcloak Guard
2.Light Stormcloak Guardress
3.Heavy Stormcloak Guard
4.Heavy Stormcloak Guardress
5.Commander Stormcloak Guard
6.Commander Stormcloak Guardress



[color=#ff7700][size=4]Attention:[/size][/color]
Stromcloak and Imperial Faction Guards Got Faction Package and will attack any rival Faction Soldiers on Sight!




[color=#0000ff][size=4]Details:[/size][/color]
You can Spawn them at where ever you want!
they will stay in spawned place and guard it!
They'll help Friends and allies! (Player is friend of them)
one good fact is that if you spawn them near chair or blacksmith or ect... (usable object)
they will use it and won't stand idle like a robot!
Their level is calculated by Players level!
Each have their own equipments!



[color=#38761D][size=6]How to Spawn them?![/size][/color]
Use console and type:
help "Orcish Guard" (which one you want)
it will bring up their baseID
then use type this:
player.placeatme "baseID" #
# is Number of Guards You Want :)
and Done!
it will appear near where you stand!
Loyal to you!
Protect you and never disappears or runs away! (Except when outnumbered and have much higher level enemies)
Its awesome for protecting a captured fort or your home and even spawning them in a big fight is Cool!


[color=#ff00ff][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]
Just copy the extracted file to Skyrim location at data folder :)
and activate it from launcher! ;)



[color=#a61c00][size=5]Recommendation:[/size][/color]
I STRONGLY recommend this mod:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41087/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D41087&pUp=1]Become High King of Skyrim[/url]

you can make this Guards as your body guard with this mod or you can trade with them and more :)



Have Fun!
author: Passerby
